sqlMap.select: SELECT LPAD((0), 2, 0)AS COMM_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT LPAD((LEVEL), 2, 0)AS COMM_CD FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 23
SELECT LPAD((0), 2, 0)AS COMM_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT LPAD((LEVEL), 2, 0)AS COMM_CD FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 59
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('X', 3) AS KEY_ID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO HIST0100 ( DPOB_CD , USR_CONNECT_YR , USR_ID , USR_CONNECT_SEIL_NUM , USR_CONNECT_DIV_CD , DEPT_CD , USR_DIV_CD , USR_NM , USR_CONNECT_BGNN_DTNTM , USR_CONNECT_END_DTNTM , SESSIONKEY , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #usrConnectYr# , #usrId# , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(USR_CONNECT_SEIL_NUM),0)+1 FROM HIST0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND USR_CONNECT_YR = #usrConnectYr# AND USR_ID = #usrId# AND USR_CONNECT_BGNN_DTNTM=(TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') || #keyId#)) , #usrConnectDivCd# , #deptCd# , #usrDivCd# , #usrNm# , (TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') || #keyId#) , (#usrConnectEndDtntm# || #keyId#) , #sessionkey# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE HIST0100 SET
USR_CONNECT_END_DTNTM=#usrConnectEndDtntm#
WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND USR_CONNECT_YR = #usrConnectYr# AND USR_ID = #usrId# AND SESSIONKEY=#sessionkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM HIST0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND USR_CONNECT_YR = #usrConnectYr# AND USR_ID = #usrId# AND USR_CONNECT_SEIL_NUM = #usrConnectSeilNum# AND USR_CONNECT_BGNN_DTNTM=#usrConnectBgnnDtntm#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM HIST0100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
USR_CONNECT_DIV_CD = #usrConnectDivCd#
USR_ID = (SELECT USR_ID FROM SYSM0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY= #systemkey#)
SUBSTR(USR_CONNECT_BGNN_DTNTM, 1, 10) >= #usrConnectBgnnDtntm#
SUBSTR(USR_CONNECT_END_DTNTM, 1, 10) <= #usrConnectEndDtntm#
DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , USR_CONNECT_YR , USR_ID , USR_CONNECT_SEIL_NUM , USR_CONNECT_DIV_CD , DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(DPOB_CD, DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , USR_DIV_CD , USR_NM , USR_CONNECT_BGNN_DTNTM , USR_CONNECT_END_DTNTM , SESSIONKEY , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM HIST0100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#
USR_CONNECT_DIV_CD = #usrConnectDivCd#
USR_ID = (SELECT USR_ID FROM SYSM0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY= #systemkey#)
SUBSTR(USR_CONNECT_BGNN_DTNTM, 1, 10) >= #usrConnectBgnnDtntm#
SUBSTR(USR_CONNECT_END_DTNTM, 1, 10) <= #usrConnectEndDtntm#
DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#
